name: Shadow
description: A shadowy figure formed from darkness and negative energy, resembling a humanoid silhouette but insubstantial and chilling. It often lurks in dark corners, ready to strike at the living.
memorable: Shadows can drain the strength of their victims, potentially creating new shadows from the fallen.
goals: To consume the life force of the living, often stalking its prey before striking.
relations: Often found in the company of other undead, or lurking in places tainted by dark magic.
environment: Deep shadows, crypts, and other dark or dimly lit areas.
strengths: High Dexterity enhances stealth and mobility; can move through tight spaces effortlessly.
weaknesses: Disadvantage on actions while in sunlight; vulnerable to radiant damage.
attacks: Strength Drain: deals necrotic damage and reduces the target's Strength score.
most_powerful_ability: Amorphous: can slip through tight spaces without squeezing.
skills: Excels in stealth with a +4 modifier, making it an effective ambusher.
additional_information: Immunities to necrotic and poison damage.
Can become a new shadow from cursed victims.
Undead nature, requiring no food or sleep.
Can blend into shadows, using stealth to evade detection.
Resistant to many damage types, including acid and fire.
test_queries: undead creature that lurks in darkness
creature that thrives in dim light
stealthy undead that moves through walls
